name: Night of the Cereals
description:
================Night of the Cereals================

(Dead by Daylight Inspired Game)

Have you ever heard of Cereal Gang? Yup it's here. Me / and the boi's at 3:00 am lurking for Cereal at Nearby Neighbors, but gotten into wrong House and there's no Cereal! and goddamn, the house is heavily Fortified Inside. And guess what the owner is Fucking Mad! Well you gotta know the know the what to do, Escape this Freaking House!

=====Local Couch Party=====

Local Couch Party supports 2-4 Player.

In Each Mode Player will be randomly Given a Role and a Class. Each Player must do their Role, In Order to Win. 

#Survivor/s must Plan for their Escape by Fixing the Fuse Boxes or Wait Til Daytime, Survivor/s will be given a Random Class, Engineer and a Support, so use that as an Advantage for Escape.

#Meanwhile, The Killer, well you probably know what to do right? Sabotage Survivor/s Escape plan by Killing them, Obviously.

====Dev Notes====

The Game currently still in Development, Have Fun Playing! and Stay Safe! :D
